process.name: Overall Application Process
process.info:
Neural Network

Using the library brain.js and Sequelize we created 1.5 million seeds using various colour to grey-scale (physics) forumalae. We then instantiated a neural network by using brain.js, modelled by the following diagram:






We then used the seeds to train the initial neural network and send it to the user through HTTP.

AI Colour Picker

AI Colour Picker uses the Farbtastic plug-in widget to dynamically update the HTML page through JavaSript. As you drag your mouse across the Farbtasic plug-in it constanly returns a string as a hex-colour. We then convert that hex-colour string to an array of RBG values and immediately returns an array which is then run against the pretrained neural net.



Train the Network!

Using randomly selected colours the user is asked their preference on wether the background colour looks better on white or black text. The response is then post and trained against the pre-configured neural network in-real time.

development.name: Motivation for Development
development.info:
Q:How can I know wether to use white or black text on a specific background colour??


A:You can never actually have a definitive answer to this question. Even in physics there are multiple formulae to solve this question because it is based on human perception.



What We Did

We trained an AI to take input from these calculations and user preference to narrow down this answer as much as possible.
